00035   /*
00036    We use (void) paramName in order to avoid the warning generated by
00037    -Wextra. For some currently unknown reason, simply deleting the 
00038    parameter name (aka, outperator<<(bool) {...}) causes a compilation
00039    error (with -Werror off) for only this class.
00040    */
00041
